WorkflowInfo.Name: Open a ServiceNow Incident following a McAfee Alarm
WorkflowInfo.Description: Open a ServiceNow Incident following a McAfee Alarm
WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information
This workflow opens a new ServiceNow incident based on a McAfee alarm's information. This workflow should be triggered upon an incoming incident from the McAfee module.

Requirements:
* McAfee Module is in Up status.
* McServiceNow Module is in Up status.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the McAfee module):
* Information

Output (variable that will be read in the parent workflow):
* ServiceNowTicket - The new ServiceNow incident ID.
